meanings.definition: Not mixed or diluted with any different or extra elements; complete and absolute.
meanings.sent1: The unalloyed joy on her face was evident to everyone around.
meanings.sent2: The cake had an unalloyed sweetness that made it irresistible.
meanings.sent3: His unalloyed enthusiasm for the project was contagious among the team.
meanings.sent4: The unalloyed beauty of the sunset took their breath away.
meanings.sent5: The unalloyed happiness in her heart shone through her eyes.

meanings.sent1: The unalloyed gold gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Her unalloyed trust in him never wavered.
meanings.sent3: The unalloyed laughter of the children filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent4: His unalloyed love for her was evident in every gesture.
meanings.sent5: The unalloyed honesty of his words struck a chord with everyone present.
